rule: Inside each paragraph, there must not be any <strong> tags.
input: Birds fly high. Fish swim deep. Animals roam the earth.
validityText:
The input consists of a paragraph with three sentences: "Birds fly high." "Fish swim deep." "Animals roam the earth." These sentences meet the criterion of being a paragraph long enough to contain at least three sentences, as specified in the input specification.

The input specification mentions that the paragraph can include words or phrases that can be emphasized using <strong> and <em> tags. However, this is optional, not mandatory. The absence of these tags does not constitute a violation of the specification.

Therefore, based on a direct and explicit evaluation against the input specification, there is no violation present in the input provided. It fully complies with the requirement of having at least three sentences in the paragraph.

OK
